fields.name: timestamp
fields.doc: When did this interaction happen, in Java milliseconds, at client side. For log-based interactions the channel-specific time stamp indicating the start of the interaction should be mapped to the generic timestamp.

fields.name: tenantId
fields.doc: The tenantId to which this interaction belongs to

fields.name: timezone
fields.doc: The time zone at client side when the interaction happened.

fields.name: sequenceId
fields.doc: Sequence number of the interaction in a conversation

fields.name: medium
fields.doc: The medium of the interaction (e.g. written, oral).

fields.name: channel
fields.doc: Channel that captured the interaction (UTS, CALL, EMAIL, PAYMENT_SYSTEM, ...)

fields.name: source
fields.doc: Specific source the interaction stems from (e.g. messagent for channel email)

fields.name: goal
fields.doc: Main goal (goal) of the interaction (complaint, ...)

fields.name: subgoal
fields.doc: More specific goal (subgoal) of the interaction (product complaint, ...)

fields.name: reason
fields.doc: Interaction reason that further clarifies the sub goal (e.g. sub goal= product complaint, reason: malfunctioning of product)

fields.name: brand
fields.doc: Brand of the item the interaction is associated to.

fields.name: inboundFlag
fields.doc: The interaction is customer initiated (inbound)

fields.name: successFlag
fields.doc: A successful interaction.

fields.name: failureReason
fields.doc: Reason the interaction failed.

fields.name: device
fields.doc: Device used by the customer for the interaction: pc, laptop, smartphone, tablet, mobile phone but not smartphone, fixed line, tablet

fields.name: geocoordinates
fields.doc: Location of customer at the time of the interaction using geocordinates

fields.name: latitude
fields.doc: Latitude of location of customer at time of the interaction

fields.name: longitude
fields.doc: Longitude of location of customer at time of the interaction

fields.name: customerCookieId
fields.doc: UUID of the cookie used to identify this user. This is a nullable ExternalID

fields.name: customerCRMId
fields.doc: ID of the CRM customer . This is a nullable ExternalID

fields.name: customerUTSId
fields.doc: Standard interaction field: the Id generated by the UTS that uniquely identifies a customer with which this interaction is associated. This is a nullable ExternalId

fields.name: userId
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the user of the web site. This is a non-nullable External Id.

fields.name: loginId
fields.doc: Unique login for the user of the web site. This is a nullable External Id.

fields.name: subscriberId
fields.doc: Number identifying the subscriber. This is a nullable ExternalID.

fields.name: customerId
fields.doc: Number identifying the customer that is involved in the mobile app interaction. This is a nullable ExternalID.

fields.name: fingerprint
fields.doc: Fingerprint used to identify the user. This is a nullable fingerprint.

fields.name: host
fields.doc: host

fields.name: pageUrl
fields.doc: filled in by the UTS client

fields.name: userAgent
fields.doc: Value of User-Agent header

fields.name: userAgentType
fields.doc: Browser, email client, feed_reader, library, media player, mobile browser, other, robot, etc.

fields.name: userAgentFamily
fields.doc: If browser: IE, Chrome, etc. If mobile browser: Chrome mobile, Mobile Safari, etc.

fields.name: operatingSystem
fields.doc: Operating system of the device the user is using.

fields.name: pageReferrer
fields.doc: The address of the web page that linked to the resource being requested.

fields.name: acceptLanguage
fields.doc: Filled in by the UTS client, using the Accept-Language header

fields.name: screenResolution
fields.doc: The resolution of the screen of the user's device.

fields.name: contentCategory
fields.doc: A unique identifier for the content category on the visited page.

fields.name: contentSubCategory
fields.doc: A unique identifier for the content subcategory on the visited page.

fields.name: contentDataType
fields.doc: The content on the web page click is text, audio, video, image, spatial,etc.

fields.name: contentType
fields.doc: The content on the page belongs to the media content or belongs to the web shop.

fields.name: contentId
fields.doc: A unique identifier for the content on the visited page. Filled in as extra parameter by the web page.

fields.name: tags
fields.doc: Tags attached to the visited digital content.

fields.name: userGeneratedContentFlag
fields.doc: Content that is user-generated.

fields.name: companyRelatedContentFlag
fields.doc: Content that is related to the company.

fields.name: subscriptionOnlyContentFlag
fields.doc: Media content that is only available to users who have a subscription

fields.name: registeredOnlyContentFlag
fields.doc: Media content that is only available to users who are logged in, but who are not necessarily subscribers.

fields.name: digitalNewsPaperContentFlag
fields.doc: Media content is part of a digital newspaper.

fields.name: utmSource
fields.doc: Identify the advertiser, site, publication, etc. that is sending traffic to your web page, e.g. google, citysearch, newsletter4, billboard.

fields.name: utmMedium
fields.doc: The advertising or marketing medium, e.g.: cpc, referral, email.

fields.name: utmCampaign
fields.doc: The individual campaign name, slogan, promo code, etc. for a product.

fields.name: utmTerm
fields.doc: Identify paid search keywords. If you're manually tagging paid keyword campaigns, you should also use utm_term to specify the keyword.

fields.name: utmContent
fields.doc: Used to differentiate similar content, or links within the same ad. For example, if you have two call-to-action links within the same email message, you can use utm_content and set different values for each so you can tell which version is more effective.

fields.name: paywallFlag
fields.doc: Customer hits the paywall (wants to read an article that is paid content)?

fields.name: userLoginFlag
fields.doc: Customer is signed in (does not necessarly mean that the web visitor is a subscriber)

fields.name: subscriberLoginFlag
fields.doc: Customer logs in as subscriber

fields.name: productPictureFlag
fields.doc: Customer clicks on a product picture

fields.name: nonCompanyRelatedFlag
fields.doc: Content distributed by the company but not about the company

fields.name: geoIp
fields.doc: GeoIP

fields.name: timeOnPage
fields.doc: The total duration that the customer views the url page.

fields.name: placementTargetedAdNbr
fields.doc: Number of placement-targeted ads (ads selected to appear on your specific site based on your url) displayed to user on the web page.

fields.name: keywordTargetedAdNbr
fields.doc: Number of keyword-based ads (ads selected to appear on specific sites) displayed to user on the web page.

fields.name: interestTargetedAdNbr
fields.doc: Number of interest-based ads (ads targeting specific users on your site based on their cookie ID) displayed to user on the web page.

fields.name: costPerClick
fields.doc: The amount the media company earns when the user clicks on an ad.

fields.name: clickAdType
fields.doc: Type of the advertisement the user clicks on: placement-targeted, keyword-targeted or interest-targeted.

fields.name: adClickRevenuePotential
fields.doc: Sum of Cost Per Click for all ads shown on the web page the user visits.

fields.name: vea
fields.doc: vea

fields.name: veb
fields.doc: veb

fields.name: memo
fields.doc: Description field for deposits

fields.name: accountType
fields.doc: Description field for account type

fields.name: offerType
fields.doc: Description field for offer type

fields.name: currentPageId
fields.doc: The reworked page URL to be more readable

fields.name: previousPageId
fields.doc: The reworked pageReferrer URL to be more readable

fields.name: simulationType
fields.doc: The type of the simulation: car loan simulation, real estate loan simulation, other loans

fields.name: simulationLoanAmount
fields.doc: The amount of the simulation

fields.name: simulationDownPayment
fields.doc: The down payment of the simulation

fields.name: simulationMonthlyPayment
fields.doc: The monthly payement of the simulation

fields.name: simulationPaymentRate
fields.doc: The Rate of the simulation

fields.name: simulationDuration
fields.doc: The duration of the simulation

fields.name: simulationTradeInValue
fields.doc: The trade in value of the simulation

fields.name: simulationCashRebate
fields.doc: The cash rebate from the simulation

fields.name: paymentNumber
fields.doc: Identifier for the payment transaction

fields.name: accountNumberCustomer
fields.doc: Account number associated to the card used during transaction. This is a nullable External ID.

fields.name: cardNumber
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the payment card used if applicable. This is a  nullable External ID.

fields.name: paymentType
fields.doc: Type of payment (credit, debit, …)

fields.name: paymentMethod
fields.doc: Specific type of payment

fields.name: transactionType
fields.doc: Type of the transaction (wire transfer, deposit, card recharge, …)

fields.name: completionFlag
fields.doc: The transaction was completed successfully

fields.name: amount
fields.doc: amount of the transaction

fields.name: currency
fields.doc: Currency used to express monetary value

fields.name: surcharge
fields.doc: Additional charge applied to the transaction

fields.name: foreignFee
fields.doc: Fee charged by other parties involved in carying out the transaction

fields.name: bannerId
fields.doc: Id of the banner

fields.name: sessionId
fields.doc: Id of the session

fields.name: action
fields.doc: Name of the action

fields.name: products_id
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the product related to the interaction.

fields.name: productName
fields.doc: Name of the product related to the interaction.

fields.name: productCategory
fields.doc: Name of the product category related to the interaction.

fields.name: productSubCategory
fields.doc: Name of the product category related to the interaction.

fields.name: action_id
fields.doc: Unique identifier for the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: CTA
fields.doc: The Call To Action of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_TYPE
fields.doc: The action type (e.g. banner) of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_SUB_TYPE
fields.doc: The action sub type (e.g. product banner) of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_DESCRIPTION
fields.doc: The description of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_NAME
fields.doc: The name of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_VALID_FROM
fields.doc: The valid from datetime of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: ACTION_VALID_TO
fields.doc: The valid to datetime of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: INCLUSION_CRITERIA
fields.doc: The criteria for including someone as target for the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: EXCLUSION_CRITERIA
fields.doc: The criteria for excluding someone as target for the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: COLOR_SCHEME
fields.doc: The color scheme of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: FONT
fields.doc: The font of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: FONT_COLOR
fields.doc: The font color of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: FONT_STYLE
fields.doc: The font style of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: FORMAT
fields.doc: The action format; e.g. standard static, of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: OFFER_CATEGORY
fields.doc: The offer category of the offer of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: OFFER_SUB_CATEGORY
fields.doc: The offer sub category of the offer of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: OFFER_DESCRIPTION
fields.doc: The offer description of the offer of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: OFFER_NAME
fields.doc: The name of the offer of the action related to the interaction.

fields.name: OFFER_ID
fields.doc: The id of the offer of the action related to the interaction.
